Metadata: Parasites in marine fishes: Questions and answers for seafood retailers
For a Revised edition, see: ORESU-G-03-015

This fact sheet has been prepared in response to many questions from seafood retailers about parasites in fish products. Customers who find parasites in fish they purchase need to have good answers for some obvious questions. KW: PARASITE; FISH; SEAFOOD RETAILERS;PUBLI​C HEALTH.
